description: NOTICE OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENTW6369-23-X033Quantum RF Sensing Lab Consumables
full_summary:
### Tender Notice: Quantum RF Sensing Lab Consumables

The Department of National Defence is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the acquisition of quantum RF sensing lab consumables, solicitation number W6369-23-X033.

#### Contract Details

* **Contract Title**: Quantum RF Sensing Lab Consumables
* **Solicitation Number**: W6369-23-X033
* **Pub Date**: January 6, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: February 20, 2023, 2:00 PM EST
* **Location**: Canada

#### Trade Agreements
This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada–Chile Free Trade Agreement
* Canada–Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada–Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada–Korea Free Trade Agreement
* Canada–Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada–Peru Free Trade Agreement

#### Requirements
The successful supplier must provide lab consumables for the Defence Research and Development Canada (DRDC) Ottawa Research Centre's newly established quantum RF sensing lab. The center will conduct experiments on novel sensing protocols and assess their potential utility to Defence applications.

#### Evaluation Criteria
Bidders will be evaluated based on the compliant bidder that submits the lowest-cost compliant proposal.

#### Security Requirements
This contract does not include a security requirement.

#### Submission Information
Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada. The successful supplier will be notified once the selection is made.

#### Attachments
To access the RFP documents, refer to the following URLs:
- English: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/06/d3717d926a3544f77d53338b39fb218e/w6369-23-x033_-_rfp_en.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/06/d3717d926a3544f77d53338b39fb218e/w6369-23-x033_-_rfp_en.pdf)
- French: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/06/f86f87bf431dd9e2ed45032a4d7915eb/w6369-23-x033_-_rfp_fr.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/
